sampleUnits.span: English Premier League to introduce spending cap in 2026/27 season
sampleUnits.context: The Premier League clubs have agreed to implement spending caps.

sampleUnits.span: clubs will be restricted to 85 per cent of their football revenue for on-field spending
sampleUnits.context: On-field spending among the clubs will be limited to 85% of their football revenue.

sampleUnits.span: clubs will face points deduction if they exceed the spending limit
sampleUnits.context: If clubs exceed the spending limit, they face a points deduction.
